title: Perform an Outbound Quality Audit
description: Before an order is sealed, a quality auditor randomly selects it for an audit to verify picking and packing accuracy.

tasks.description: Scan a package's shipping label at the audit station.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system displays the order details for the auditor.

tasks.description: The auditor opens the package and scans each item inside to verify it against the order.
tasks.expected_outcome: The auditor finds that all items and quantities are correct.

tasks.description: The auditor marks the quality audit as 'Passed' in the system.
tasks.expected_outcome: The order is logged as having passed the audit.

tasks.description: The package is resealed and sent to the shipping dock.
tasks.expected_outcome: The audited package proceeds to shipping.
